detailedFinding: Bank reconciliations for October, November, and December 2023 were not prepared, resulting in unreconciled variance of ZMW 2.8M
recommendation: Prepare all outstanding bank reconciliations immediately and implement monthly reconciliation process with management review

managementResponse.proposedAction: Hire additional accounting staff, implement weekly reconciliation schedule

detailedFinding: 15 single source procurements totaling ZMW 45.8M were conducted without proper justification or approval as required by procurement regulations
recommendation: Develop and implement single source procurement approval framework with Cabinet Office oversight. Conduct refresher training for procurement staff on competitive bidding requirements

managementResponse.proposedAction: Implement approval matrix, strengthen procurement planning, provide staff training

detailedFinding: Payroll register shows 28 employees not found in biometric attendance system. Physical verification pending for these employees
recommendation: Conduct immediate physical headcount of all employees. Implement mandatory biometric attendance linked to payroll processing. Suspend payments for unverified employees

managementResponse.proposedAction: Physical verification in progress, biometric integration planned

followUpActions: Complete physical verification of all 28 employees

detailedFinding: Asset register last updated in June 2023. Physical verification reveals 47 high-value medical equipment items missing or unaccounted for, valued at ZMW 8.2M
recommendation: Conduct comprehensive asset verification and update register. Implement quarterly physical verification cycle. Assign dedicated asset management officer. Investigate missing items

managementResponse.proposedAction: Full asset verification underway, recruitment of asset officer approved

followUpActions: Recruit and deploy asset management officer
Investigate and report on missing items

finding: Revenue Collection Shortfalls and Missing Receipts
detailedFinding: Actual revenue collected 35% below projected collections. Missing receipt serial numbers from 5 revenue collectors. Unbanked cash of ZMW 850,000 identified
recommendation: Implement electronic receipting system immediately. Conduct investigation into missing receipts and unbanked revenue. Enforce daily banking policy. Deploy GPS tracking for revenue collectors

managementResponse.proposedAction: Suspend implicated collectors, deploy mobile money receipting, strengthen supervision

detailedFinding: Quarterly reports to World Bank and AfDB submitted an average of 23 days late. Budget reallocations of ZMW 15.2M not pre-approved by donors as required
recommendation: Establish grant reporting calendar with automated reminders. Formalize budget reallocation approval process. Assign dedicated grant compliance officer. Seek retroactive approval for past reallocations

managementResponse.proposedAction: Implement reporting calendar, strengthen donor communication, hire compliance officer

followUpActions: Create reporting calendar for all grants
Train project staff on donor requirements

detailedFinding: Supporting documentation (receipts, contracts, delivery notes) missing for 87 transactions totaling ZMW 18.5M. Payments processed without proper authorization
recommendation: Strengthen document management system. Implement mandatory documentation checklist before payment processing. Conduct training on financial documentation requirements. Attempt to obtain missing documents within 30 days

managementResponse.proposedAction: Retrieve missing documents, implement electronic document management system

detailedFinding: 5 contract variations totaling ZMW 12.3M implemented without proper approval documentation. Project completion delayed by 67 days beyond contract timeline
recommendation: Establish formal contract variation approval process. Ensure all variations properly documented and approved before implementation. Assess liquidated damages for delay. Strengthen project monitoring

managementResponse.proposedAction: Seek retroactive approvals, formalize variation process, assess contractor penalties

followUpActions: Train project staff on contract administration
